name: Kartik Verma

projects.name: Dyslexia Prediction Model
projects.description: Platform that predicts the likelihood of dyslexia. Incorporating Logistic Regression, SVM, and Decision Tree models to predict dyslexia likelihood. Predict using handwritten text samples uploaded by the user. Collaborate with a team of 4 members. Dyslexia Prediction Model has an accuracy rate of up to 95%.

projects.name: W-U-W (Website)
projects.description: Designed a website that provides a platform for customers to interact with service providers. Key features: work as a mediator between user and service provider. Collaborate with a team of 3 members. Utilizes HTML, Javascript, and Bootstrap to create the front end, including login and various Pages.

experiences.description: Focused on HTML,CSS, JavaScript. Demonstrated proficiency in web technologies: a visually captivating Portfolio website and a user-friendly Signup Page. Utilizes HTML, JavaScript, and CSS to build these projects.

experiences.role_name: Internship in advance programming in C
experiences.description: This internship not only provided me with a firm grip on concepts but also honed my coding skills. Learned how to tackle different errors in the program. Also develop a Library management system.
